subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: His scoring and ice time are down, but Jaromir Jagr has all but willed the sixth-seeded Rangers into the playoffs where they will face the Atlanta Thrashers on Thursday.
snippet: His scoring and ice time are down, but Jaromir Jagr has all but willed the sixth-seeded Rangers into the playoffs where they will face the Atlanta Thrashers on Thursday.
